meanings.definition: Situated or occurring below the center.
meanings.sent1: The basement is a subcentral location in the house.
meanings.sent2: The lower floors of the building are subcentral to the main lobby.
meanings.sent3: The roots of the tree play a subcentral role in providing stability.
meanings.sent4: The foundation is subcentral to the strength of the entire structure.
meanings.sent5: The roots, being subcentral, anchor the plant firmly in the ground.

meanings.sent1: The local library serves as a subcentral for community activities.
meanings.sent2: The branch office acts as a subcentral for coordinating regional operations.
meanings.sent3: The small cafe became a subcentral for gossip among the townsfolk.
meanings.sent4: The control room functions as a subcentral for monitoring the entire system.
meanings.sent5: The hub, being a subcentral, connects various departments efficiently.
